candidate Profile Description.summary: An experienced Machine Learning engineer with a master's degree in robotics & AI. Skilled with both traditional and deep Machine Learning and Computer Vision algorithms. Primarily focused on Python, PyTorch, and Linux. Learning MLOps.

work_experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
work_experience.description: Developed automated visual quality inspection systems using various Machine Learning and Computer Vision algorithms. Worked on drone vision systems running on ROS and created an API for GPS devices using Flask.

work_experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
work_experience.description: Developed multiple computer vision algorithms using OpenCV and PyTorch for detecting faults on MDF boards and trained a YOLOv5 network to detect products with missing top covers.

projects.name: Predicting fates of passengers aboard the Titanic
projects.description: Used Pandas for data exploration and preprocessing. Utilized MLFlow for experiment tracking and Random Forest model for prediction. Deployed the model as a Docker container.

projects.name: Robotic Palletization using Computer Vision
projects.description: Master's thesis project. Developed a robotic system that detected objects, grabbed them, and placed them on ArUco markers using a UR5 robot arm, Robotiq 3-Finger gripper, and Intel RealSense LIDAR camera.

projects.name: AI Agent for Pong
projects.description: Trained an AI agent to play a game of Pong inside the OpenAI Gym using PyTorch.

projects.name: Android app for animal classification
projects.description: Bachelor's thesis project. Developed an app that uses the MobileNetV2 CNN to classify pictures of animals, trained in TensorFlow using Transfer Learning.
